Title: Relates to the probable usefulness of judgments, compromised claims or settled claims resulting from certain child sexual abuse cases
Summary: Sets the probable usefulness of judgments, compromised claims or settled claims resulting from certain child sexual abuse cases to up to 30 years.
LawCode: Amd ยง11.00, Loc Fin L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the local finance law, in relation to the probable usefulness of judgments, compromised claims or settled claims resulting from certain child sexual abuse cases
